custom-proposal-app.name: Custom Proposal App
custom-proposal-app.headline: Create custom proposals for your organization
custom-proposal-app.description: I built this app to allow companies to create their own client-facing proposal tools. In other words, this app will allow you to create an account, then create a new proposal, and dynamically fill it with custom questions. They can assign each question (and that question's options) a value (ex: $300 for option 'A'). This let's a sales team walk through the newly created survey and get an immediate price returned to them.

21-zero.name: 21 Zero
21-zero.headline: My business for building sites, apps and marketing
21-zero.description: I stay pretty busy running my own business. In addition to building this site as an advertising piece, I work alongside my other developers to build many of our clients sites. We also build web apps and do a lot of online marketing. Search engine optimization (SEO), Pay Per Click (PPC), Social and content marketing
